subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] IS ANYONE HERE INTERESTED IN ANYTHING OTHER THAN POSTING EVP`S HERE ?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
The group actually mainly focuses on Frank's box. But we do discuss
other types of EVP and I think any topics that are related are
welcome.

Zack


On 6/11/11, ozestrangeufo <ozestrangeufo@...> wrote:
> Hi
> Is there anyone here interested in anything to do with some of the
> science/history behind the EVP phenomena.?Or is this just a forum for
> posting evp`s and guessing what they said.Just a little confused..and I
> mean no offense..
> Mike
